# ggbash

ggbash is the bash-like environment for ggplot2.

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(ggbash)

ggbash() # enter into ggbash session

user@host currentDir $ use iris
user@host currentDir (iris) $ point 2 3 color=4

```
